answers.answer: Same here. I've been taking Tylenol for the pain and using a neti pot and squeeze bottle to irrigate my sinuses. There has been a lot of soup in our house lately. I'm over the worst of it, but I still have terrible congestion that keeps me from sleeping.

Well I hope you feel better soon because this *****! :( The lack of sleep has caused me to argue and fight with my fiance and I feel terrible afterwards. I have been yelling, screaming, and getting worked up the past couple of days which doesn't help and I'm afraid of making my blood pressure go up since I am high risk for preeclampsia. I have to work tomorrow and im just dreading every day :(
Have you tried calling the doctor to see if they can get you in sooner?

I have exactly the same symptoms as you I also have blocked ears and blood shot eyes on top of everything else, i found that a glass of milk before bed, hot water bottle under your pillow case for your ear and to use Vicks vapor rub on your chest works well for me

Yes and Friday was as soon as they could get me in. Im just miserable and want to sleep. I have a baf history with strep throat and my tonsils. They give me horrible infections.. will a doctor prescribe me antibiotics? I'm 36 weeks

Yeah I've just had a course on amoxicilian 500mg and I'm 34 weeks pregnant also was given them at 9 weeks they don't really touch me or make me better to be honest think you just got to ride it out sadly :-(
Ohh noo :( I hate being sick.
Try honey and warm apple cider vinegar mixed
I have gestational diabetes :/ I cant have a lot of sugar... although that sounds a lot more tasty then what I've been drinking.

question: I have had a terrible headache, sore throat, and ear aches for almost a week now! I have taken everything that I read was safe and nothing works!! Over the counter meds, teas, liquids, water with lemon, honey, ginger... NOTHING!!! My fiance even went out and bought a $100 humidifier and it helped me sleep.. for a total of four hours and then I was up due to the pain from my throat. The ER wouldn't do anything for me and my next doctors appointment isn't til Friday but I really don't think I can make it that long. Im in a ton of pain, not eating as much as I should, and I'm so sleep deprived!!! What can I do??!! My poor little man hasn't moved much so I hope whatever I have isn't affecting him.
title: Its been almost a week!!!!
